Docs.summary: Key to extract the audio bitrate from the MediaRecorder#getMetrics return.

remarks.para: Key to extract the audio bitrate from the MediaRecorder#getMetrics return. The value is an integer.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Key to extract the recorded movies time units from the MediaRecorder#getMetrics return.

remarks.para: Key to extract the recorded movies time units from the MediaRecorder#getMetrics return. The value is an integer. A value of 1000 indicates that the movie's timing is in milliseconds.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
